tossup_question: 9) PHYSICS  What are things that fall into a black hole known as?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Particulate matter
X) Singularity
Y) Information
Z) Degenerate
bonus_question: 9) PHYSICS  Black holes stemmed from the results of what theory of spacetime?
bonus_answer: ANSWER: GENERAL RELATIVITY (do not accept: special)
